item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Falchioneers are among the most fearsome troops in the C'tissian army. They wield two huge falchions in battle and don light armor. The use of two large weapons is exhausting, which is why falchioneers do not use heavy armor.
